Detailed Description

A four-dimensional version of the Sierpinski Gasket.

This object is similar to the Menger Sponge, but it uses a Hypersimplex as generator.

It lacks the distance parameter, because there is only one way to generate a Sierpinski Gasket of level n. Otherwise it is analogous to the Menger Sponge fractal.
